SUPPORT_US_SCREEN_WHY_DONATE_TITLE: Why you should consider supporting us
SUPPORT_US_SCREEN_WHY_DONATE_CONTENT: Supporting Eco Track, a carbon footprint tracking app, is crucial due to its ability to raise environmental awareness, promote behavioral change, facilitate data-driven decisions, foster accountability and transparency, engage communities, serve corporate and institutional needs, and act as an educational tool. By tracking carbon footprints and encouraging sustainable behavior, the app plays a pivotal role in empowering individuals and communities to take meaningful action towards a greener future.
